summary: Retextures zephyr to look like the hunting bow and changes the temper recipe to 1 firewood and 1 steel ingot.
descriptionHtml: If you're like me, you love the ability and stats of Zephyr but prefer the hunting bow's appearance over the dwarven bow. If so then this mod is for you. Quite simply, it makes Zephyr look like the hunting bow and changes the category and tempering recipe to better match its new look. please bear in mind i am very new to the modding scene and have only madde a few personal weapons in CK. this is my first ever upload, please enjoy =) anyone can use this mod in theirs but please give me credit as i'm the first person (that i know of) to do this.
author: pokemontrainer0426
